attributes.action: Recognise Somaliland as an independent state
attributes.additional_details: We believe recognising Somaliland as an independent state will help promote democracy and good governance.
attributes.background: The right to self-determination appears to be applicable to Somaliland. We therefore want the UK Government to formally recognise Somaliland as an independent state.
